extracted_information: BAILII (British and Irish Legal Information Institute) provides free access to British and Irish case law & legislation, European Union case law, Law Commission reports, and other law-related British and Irish material. They emphasize maintaining free access for everyone and rely on donations to support their services. The website provides links to a 'Copyright Policy' and 'Disclaimers' which typically cover terms of use, but the content of these policies is not present on this page.

pricing.donations_status: Voluntary donations requested to maintain service

features: Access to Freely Available British and Irish Public Legal Information
British and Irish case law & legislation
Other law-related British and Irish material
Various databases for UK (England and Wales, Scotland, Northern Ireland, Jersey, Saint Helena), Ireland, Europe, United Arab Emirates (Abu Dhabi, Dubai), Qatar, Singapore, Cayman Islands
BAILII OpenLaw - Leading Cases by Subject
Search functionalities: Find by Case Citation, Find by Case Title, Case Law Search, Legislation Search, Other Materials Search, Advanced Search

temporal_info.25th_anniversary: Mentioned as a reason to donate

coverage: United Kingdom (England and Wales, Scotland, Northern Ireland, Jersey, Saint Helena)
